Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I
came here today to tell you about a new
<RED>festival</RED> that I decided to throw.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that festival is... the <RED>Snow
Festival</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone gets together and creates snow
sculptures. After that, we enjoy a great
stew. I hope you can join us, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival is held on <BLUE>Winter 4</BLUE>
from <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
On the day, be sure to come talk to me
at the festival entrance before <BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>,
OK?
<PAGE>
You can't join in if you're late, so
watch the time, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival is held every year
on <BLUE>Winter 4</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
As today just happens to be Winter 4,
the festival will take place this
afternoon. Sorry for the short notice!
<PAGE>
It starts from <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival
grounds</GREEN>, so come talk to me at the
festival entrance before <BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>, OK?
<PAGE>
You can't join in if you're late, so
watch the time, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can confirm the festival's details
on the <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>, so look it over if you
need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
